description: Returns a list of all scans in an account. Does not return EXPRESS scans.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: A pagination token. You can use this in future calls to ListScans to continue listing results after the current page.

nested_items.name: summaries
nested_items.description: A list of ScanSummary objects with information about all scans in an account.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The time when the scan was created.

nested_items.name: runId
nested_items.description: The identifier for the scan run.

nested_items.name: scanNameArn
nested_items.description: The ARN for the scan name.

nested_items.name: scanState
nested_items.description: The state of the scan. A scan can be In Progress, Complete, or Failed.

nested_items.name: updatedAt
nested_items.description: The time the scan was last updated. A scan is updated when it is re-run.
